what we do

Getting your business online, without the faff.

We specialise in designing and developing websites and technology for small and growing businesses across the UK.

All of our code is written by hand (no wordpress) to ensure exceptional performance, helping you bring in more businesses and waste less time wanting to throw your computer out the window.

Do Business Anywhere

Our sites and systems are designed to work when you and your customers are on the go - including beautiful websites from your phone to your desktop.

Get Found Faster

Sites built to help you rank and support with your business profiles on Google, Bing and/or Facebook to help customers find you.

Save Time and Money

We help you find the right solutions, at the right price, without confusing jargon or unexpected add-ons.

Get a shiny new website from £1,900 or £180 per month.

See Pricing Who We Are

who we are

Hello from Lucy,
Our Peculiar Founder.

I am an owner of a small ambitious business, like you. I jumped into Entrepreneurship to help small business owners access the data and technology I've seen and built whilst working at Google, Amazon, Health-Tech Startups and consulting for clients ranging from high-street banks to global retailers.

I want it to be easier and more affordable for small British businesses to grow and compete with big business, to make the use of technology and AI simple and to build a slick presence on the web without being bamboozled by jargon or extorted by shady technology companies.

About Us What We Do

Our services

Technology should save you time and money.

Understand, optimise and connect your business processes and technology to reduce cost, increase security and attract more business.

Website & App Development

Build or update your website to attract more customers, save you time and stand out from the crowd.

Routine & On Call Support

Dedicated access to expertise in technology, business operations and strategy, when you need it.

Integration & Automation

Design, integrate and build the right technology, processes and systems for your business.

Business Analytics

Assess performance, manage risk and identify opportunities to improve processes and systems.
